Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class Slot

    Stores a slot's current pose. Slots organize attachments for {@link Skeleton#drawOrder} purposes and provide a place to store state for an attachment.State cannot be stored in an attachment itself because attachments are stateless and may be shared across multiple skeletons.

    Slot

    Deform

    Vertices to deform the slot's attachment. For an unweighted mesh, the entries are local positions for each vertex. For a weighted mesh, the entries are an offset for each vertex which will be added to the mesh's local vertex positions.

    See ComputeWorldVertices(Slot, Int32, Int32, Single[], Int32, Int32) and DeformTimeline.

    Declaration
    public ExposedList<float> Deform { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    ExposedList<Single>
